product_name: Wasatch Eleveners: A Hiking and Climbing Guide to the 11,000-foot Mountains of Utah's Wasatch Range
long_description: This guide provides trailhead access, approaches and routes for every 11,000-foot peak. Author: Randy Winters. Softcover; 124 pages; black-and-white photos; topo map reprints. University of Utah Press; copyright 2006. Includes overview maps of major roads, topographical overview maps and detailed route maps for each peak. Total roundup mileages, elevation-gain/loss figures and alternate routes to help hikers plan their adventures. Each of the eleveners can be summited as a day hike, without the use of climbing gear.
short_description: This guide provides trailhead access, approaches and routes for every 11,000-foot peak.
